subject: Cancel my order
description_text:
Please cancel my order SSN4001 please send me return information when I
receive it

conversations.body_text: We have resumed your shipment after receiving your request not to cancel. May we ask why you wish to cancel again?
Because I ordered the wrong item sorry for any inconvenience caused

Because I ordered the wrong item sorry for any inconvenience caused order
number SSN4001

Hi A Hussain,  We're sorry, your package has already been shipped and cannot be cancelled. You can return it to our German warehouse after receiving it, and we will issue a refund after inspection.  Gubitz GmbH(LeiXuan A211) Hüttenkamp 12 Neumünster,Schleswig-Holstein   24536 +49 17622233089
Return postage label required to return items order number SSN4001

Regarding my return could you please give me a post code and how to send it
back how wood you know it from me you have a depo in uk

Hi A Hussain,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Our UK warehouse is not yet operational, so you can only return your package to our German warehouse at this time.   Gubitz GmbH(LeiXuan A211) Hüttenkamp 12 Neumünster,Schleswig-Holstein   24536 +49 17622233089

If the cost is reasonable, you may pay it in advance, and we will reimburse you when processing the refund. If the cost is too high, please do not pay it.
